DOC.brief_summary: To prospectively determine appropriate inseminated volume donor IUI cycle . It hypothesize procedure perform 0.5 mL instead 0.2 , high clinical pregnancy rate achieve promote high sperm density fallopian tubes time ovulation decrease amount sperm cell lose preparation handling .
DOC.brief_title: 0.2 ml vs. 0.5 Inseminated Volume Donor Intrauterine Insemination Cycles : A Prospective RCT
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective RCT perform , include patient undergoing dIUI ovulation induction . The trial establish compare two inseminated volume , 0.2 ml ( control group ) 0.5 mL ( study group ) , conduct Reproductive Medicine Service Dexeus Women 's Health Center . The Institutional Review Board approve research project inform consent obtain patient participate study . All patient undergo full infertility investigation include hormonal evaluation day 2 day 5 cycle confirmation patency Fallopian tube . Patients eligible study 18 40 year old , regular menstrual cycle ( 21 - 35 day ) . Indications use donor sperm male factor infertility due azoospermia severe oligoasthenoteratozoospermia ( require donor sperm ) , presence heritable genetic disorder male partner , single-parent request same-sex couple ' partner undergo IUI . Exclusion criterion presence tubal factor infertility , ≥grade III endometriosis , 3 previous dIUI cycle , patient ≥3 follicle > 14mm observed cycle . The randomization procedure take place day donor IUI procedure . The randomization perform IUI cycle level . Randomization one two group perform use open computer-generated list . IUI perform Wallace® catheter deposit 0.2 0.5 ml sperm sample uterine fundus . All IUIs perform 12 p.m. 4 pm . After procedure , 10 min bed rest prescribe . Inseminations perform every day week , include weekend .
